module-credits.settings.allowHTMLforAllS: Allow HTML Parse to parse all Module Settings
If this is enabled, Module Credits will parse all Module Settings, titles and notes/hints and format them.
module-credits.settings.showNewChangelog: This will show any unseen changelogs when the wold loads up.
module-credits.settings.defaultIcons.hin: Adds font icons for Javascript, CSS and Compendium
module-credits.settings.condenseDefaultT: Hides the text of default tags and will only show the icon for that tag.
module-credits.settings.condenseTags.hin: Hides the text of tags from Module Credits if it isn't an extrenal source. *(Only show Icons)*
module-credits.settings.condenseCompatib: Replaces the text of the Compatibility Risk Tag with a Triangle Explanation Mark.
Replaces the Version Text with the First Character then Version Numbner. eg `V.0.0.3`
module-credits.settings.showReadme.name: Add Wiki Tag
module-credits.settings.showReadme.hint: If the module contains the `readme` property, this will add a clickable tag that will take you to that url
module-credits.settings.fetchLocalReadme: Allow module credits to search module directories for local `readme.md` files.
module-credits.settings.showIssues.name: Add Issues Tag
module-credits.settings.showIssues.hint: If the module contains the `bugs` property, this will add a clickable tag that will take you to that url
module-credits.settings.showChangelog.hi: If the module contains the `changelog` property, this will add a clickable tag that will take you to that url
module-credits.settings.fetchLocalChange: Allow module credits to search module directories for local `changelog.md` files.
module-credits.resetDialog.name: Reset Tracked Changelogs
module-credits.resetDialog.hint: Confirming this reset, will set all changelogs to unseen.
module-credits.text.readme.name: wiki
module-credits.text.issues.name: issues
module-credits.text.changelog.name: changelog
